link_desc:
Python scripts and template that can be used to monitor your Pure Storage FlashArray.

Based on :

  • LLD
  • Custom Scripts
  • Zabbix Trapper
  • Zabbix Sender

Put the scripts on your Proxy or Server and let the discovery do the rest.

More information here : https://jeremyverda.net/zabbix-and-pure-storage-monitoring-v2/

History of version

V2

Everything in one Python file and more information (disks, volumes, hosts, global)

V1

Based on our proof of concept with the appliance
